title: Sociological Theory - Talking Your Self into It: How and When Accounts Shape Motivation for Action
description: Co-authors Daniel Winchester and Kyle D. Green discuss their article, "Talking Your Self into It: How and When Accounts Shape Motivation for Action," published in the September 2019 issue of Sociological Theory.
content:encoded: Co-authors Daniel Winchester and Kyle D. Green discuss their article, "Talking Your Self into It: How and When Accounts Shape Motivation for Action," published in the September 2019 issue of Sociological Theory.
itunes:subtitle: An American Sociological Association Podcast
